feed.title: Combined summary - Make links on 'About Bitcoin Core' into clickable #4211

entry.title: Combined summary - Make links on 'About Bitcoin Core' into clickable #4211
entry.summary: A new developer has shown interest in contributing to the BitcoinQt project. Their first contribution is aimed at enhancing user experience by making the links on the 'About Bitcoin Core' page clickable. The individual has submitted a pull request for their proposed changes on Github and is seeking feedback from other members of the community. The pull request can be found at: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/4211.However, some concern has been raised regarding potential difficulties with translating the page. The community is providing feedback on the pull request to ensure that the proposed changes do not cause any issues with translation. The individual is open to suggestions and willing to work with the community to make sure that the changes are beneficial for all users.The pull request is an example of how new developers can contribute to the Bitcoin community and help improve the user experience. It also highlights the importance of collaboration and communication within the community to ensure that changes are made in a way that benefits everyone. Overall, the individual's initiative and willingness to seek feedback is a positive step towards the growth and development of the Bitcoin community.
